name: Multiverse (gmx0)
description:
An experimental simulator of a multiverse. You play as, well, God, trying to connect the universes with wormholes to each. Universes may merge together.

Left click on a universe and drag and release on another universe to connect them with a wormhole.
Press R to create a new multiverse.

I want to add more features and gameplay, but I have other projects. If I get donations of over $4, I will consider it.

Possible gameplay:

RTS between with universe as bases or even units.
